mapper.select: select x.*,y.text from ${jdbc.schema}.sea_thongtingiadinh x left join ${jdbc.schema_02}.tab_lov y on x.quanhe=y.id where x.id = #{id}

SELECT x.so,DATE_FORMAT(x.tungay, '%d/%m/%Y') as tungay,DATE_FORMAT(x.denngay, '%d/%m/%Y') as denngay FROM ${jdbc.schema}.sea_chungchithuyenvien x where x.thuyenvienId=#{thuyenvienId} and x.tenchungchiVal=2

select lt.*, IF( denngay is null,"", ROUND(DATEDIFF(denngay,tungay)/30,1) ) as monthtour ,ltp.text as loaitau_text,g.text as chucdanh_text from ${jdbc.schema}.sea_kinhnghiemlamviec lt left join (select * from sea_userdb.tab_lov lt2 where lt2.code like 'T001') ltp on (lt.loaitau = ltp.id) left join (select * from sea_userdb.tab_lov lt2 where lt2.code like 'TV002') g on (lt.chucdanh = g.value) where lt.thuyenvienId=#{thuyenvien_id} and (lt.loaitau=235 or lt.loaitau=236 or lt.loaitau =156) order by lt.tungay,lt.denngay;

select lt.*, IF( denngay is null,"", ROUND(DATEDIFF(denngay,tungay)/30,1) ) as monthtour ,ltp.text as loaitau_text,g.text as chucdanh_text from ${jdbc.schema}.sea_kinhnghiemlamviec lt left join (select * from sea_userdb.tab_lov lt2 where lt2.code like 'T001') ltp on (lt.loaitau = ltp.id) left join (select * from sea_userdb.tab_lov lt2 where lt2.code like 'TV002') g on (lt.chucdanh = g.value) where lt.thuyenvienId=#{thuyenvien_id} and lt.loaitau not in (235,236,156) order by lt.tungay,lt.denngay;

select x.value as VALUE,x.parentid as PARENTID,x.id as ID,x.text as text, x.textEn,x.code as CODE,x.isactive as ISACTIVE,x.sort as SORT,y.parentcode as textparent from ${jdbc.schema_02}.tab_lov x,${jdbc.schema_02}.tab_lov_cat y where x.ID=#{ID} and x.code=y.code ;

select x.VALUE as ID ,x.text as TEXT from sea_userdb.tab_lov x left join ( SELECT * FROM sea_quanlythuyenviendb.sea_chungchithuyenvien cctt WHERE cctt.thuyenvienId = #{crewId} ) y on x.VALUE = y.tenchungchiVAL WHERE x.CODE='TV001' and x.ISACTIVE=1 and y.tenchungchiVAL IS NULL;
